Name: Sweet Jasmine
SeedDescription: Plant in the fall. Takes 7 days to produce bright flowers.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.es: Plántalas en otoño. Toma 7 días para producir flores brillantes.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.de: Pflanzen sie im Herbst. Wächst in 10 Tagen heran.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ja: 秋植えの花。7日かけて明るい色の花を咲かせる。色は咲いてのおたのしみ。
SeedDescriptionLocalization.pt: Plante-as no outono. Demoram 7 dias para produzirem algumas flores brilhantes.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.zh: 秋天播种。7天后收获纯净的花。
